text:
Late to the party but here are my thoughts:

If you have the budget, I would for sure write a Press Release and distribute it on the newswire. It's great for awareness and also enhances and verifies your brand by appearing on respectable media sites.

They are also very important for Sales, they can share it with prospects and in their Social Medias, but you'll have to advise them on the best way to do that.

If you are doing any Social, make sure to coordinate first with the customer's Social/Communications team and also with your team so everyone can engage with the posts (Retweets, Likes and Comments).
